name: Sword Damage
description:
Increases the
damage of the
sword by 2%

name: Shuriken Damage
description:
Increases the
damage of the
shuriken by 2%

name: Area Damage
description:
Increases the
damage of the
area by 2%

name: +1 Shuriken
description:
Increases the
number of
shurikens by 1

name: + Area Radius
description:
Increases the
radius of
the area by 10%

name: Sword Cooldown
description:
Decreases the
cooldown of the
sword by 2%

name: Sword Duration
description:
Increases the
duration of the
sword by 2%
